inputsClass.name: heading
inputsClass.rawdescription: Heading for hamburger outside/outside-non-collapsible/inside sections. Renders heading first if given, then projected header, if any.
inputsClass.description: Heading for hamburger outside/outside-non-collapsible/inside sections. Renders heading first if given, then projected header, if any.

inputsClass.rawdescription: if true, drawer is collapsible, else shows a non-collapsible drawer.
inputsClass.description: if true, drawer is collapsible, else shows a non-collapsible drawer.

inputsClass.name: isHamburgerStyle
inputsClass.rawdescription: If true, shows hamburger icon, else shows expand/collapse icon.
inputsClass.description: If true, shows hamburger icon, else shows expand/collapse icon.

inputsClass.name: items
inputsClass.rawdescription: NavItems of type NavItem. renders items first if given, then projected content, if any.
inputsClass.description: NavItems of type NavItem. renders items first if given, then projected content, if any.

inputsClass.name: opened
inputsClass.rawdescription: toggles aside drawer show/hide.
inputsClass.description: toggles aside drawer show/hide.

components.description:
Shows aside navigation. Allows both header and body content projection. Also NavItems can be passed to it.

Header Content Projection

  • anu-aside-nav-header class="outside/outside-non-collapsible/inside" for projecting heading to multiple locations.

Customized content

  • Use isCollapsiple property as false, to show non-collapsible aside nav. By default it is collapsible.
  • Use isHamburgerStyle property to show hamburger or collapse/expand icons.
  • Use hamburgerClassNames and drawerClassNames properties to customize hamburger and drawer components of aside nav.
components.rawdescription:
Shows aside navigation. Allows both header and body content projection. Also NavItems can be passed to it.

Header Content Projection

  • anu-aside-nav-header class="outside/outside-non-collapsible/inside" for projecting heading to multiple locations.

Customized content

  • Use isCollapsiple property as false, to show non-collapsible aside nav. By default it is collapsible.
  • Use isHamburgerStyle property to show hamburger or collapse/expand icons.
  • Use hamburgerClassNames and drawerClassNames properties to customize hamburger and drawer components of aside nav.

components.name: CardComponent
components.description: passing class="nowrap" or nowrap-* variations to the card from consumer, will enable horizontal card. Otherwise it will display a verical card. padding of the card is also control from consuemer component.
components.rawdescription:
passing class="nowrap" or nowrap-* variations to the card from consumer, will enable horizontal card.
Otherwise it will display a verical card.
padding of the card is also control from consuemer component.
components.templateData:
<!-- <section class="anu_card"> -->
<section class="anu_card_image" [ngClass]="imageCssClasses">
  <ng-content select="['anu-card-image']"></ng-content>
</section>
<section class="anu_card_content" [ngClass]="contentCssClasses">
  <ng-content select="['anu-card-title']"></ng-content>
  <ng-content select="['anu-card-body']"></ng-content>
  <ng-content select="['anu-card-footer']"></ng-content>
</section>
<!-- </section> -->

components.name: CodeBlockComponent

inputsClass.name: enableEdit
inputsClass.rawdescription: enableEdit property if false, shows the highlighted code block, and does not allow to edit the source code and its language. If true, edit toolbar becomes visible, and user can update source code and its language.
inputsClass.description: enableEdit property if false, shows the highlighted code block, and does not allow to edit the source code and its language. If true, edit toolbar becomes visible, and user can update source code and its language.

inputsClass.name: language
inputsClass.rawdescription: Source code language, ie. one of the supported language name.
inputsClass.description: Source code language, ie. one of the supported language name.

inputsClass.name: source
inputsClass.rawdescription: Source code that needs to be highlighted.
inputsClass.description: Source code that needs to be highlighted.

components.description: CodeBlock Component applies the formatting and highlighting of the source code and renders the source code in <pre> and <code> html tag. This uses Primejs javascript library for this purpose. Component supports many other languages including javascript, typescript, scss, sass, css, markup etc..
components.rawdescription: CodeBlock Component applies the formatting and highlighting of the source code and renders the source code in \ and \ html tag. This uses Primejs javascript library for this purpose. Component supports many other languages including javascript, typescript, scss, sass, css, markup etc..

inputsClass.description: A ColorPalette Objcet containg name, hue, saturation, and colors array

propertiesClass.name: headerText
propertiesClass.description: A property bound to header title of component palette name postfixed with Pallete. eg. "Primary Palette"
propertiesClass.rawdescription: A property bound to header title of component palette name postfixed with Pallete. eg. "Primary Palette"

propertiesClass.name: hueControl
propertiesClass.description: A property bound to slider form control, that allow to get/set hue value
propertiesClass.rawdescription: A property bound to slider form control, that allow to get/set hue value

propertiesClass.name: lightsForm
propertiesClass.description: Property bound to slider form controls group, that allow to get/set light value to all colors
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Property bound to slider form controls group, that allow to get/set light value to all colors

propertiesClass.name: saturationControl
propertiesClass.description: A property bound to slider form control, that allow to get/set saturation value
propertiesClass.rawdescription: A property bound to slider form control, that allow to get/set saturation value

methodsClass.name: updateColorPalette
methodsClass.rawdescription: Builds the palette from current hue and saturation, and emits the valueChanges event, with the colorPalette object.
methodsClass.description: Builds the palette from current hue and saturation, and emits the valueChanges event, with the colorPalette object.

components.description: ColorPaletteComponent generates 9 shades of colors based on input property, colorPalette.hue and colorPalette.saturation, ranging from DeepDark ... Normal ... DeepLight. Shades are generated based on calculated Lightness of the color.
components.rawdescription: ColorPaletteComponent generates 9 shades of colors based on input property, colorPalette.hue and colorPalette.saturation, ranging from DeepDark ... Normal ... DeepLight. Shades are generated based on calculated Lightness of the color.

components.name: DrawerComponent

inputsClass.name: opened
inputsClass.rawdescription: Property opened shows or hides the drawer based on value true/false;
inputsClass.description: Property opened shows or hides the drawer based on value true/false;

inputsClass.name: overlayClassNames
inputsClass.rawdescription: Shows drawer relative to parent, window, push content.
inputsClass.description: Shows drawer relative to parent, window, push content.

inputsClass.name: positionClassNames
inputsClass.rawdescription: position shows the drawer top/right/bottom/left from the relative parent or from the screen based on drawer overlay class names.
inputsClass.description: position shows the drawer top/right/bottom/left from the relative parent or from the screen based on drawer overlay class names.

components.description:
CSS classes based drawer component. Show the drawer using below CSS classes:

CSS Class NameDescription
.drawer-content-pushed
Postfixes: -sm/-md/-lg.		pushes surrounding content, when visible.
.drawer-relative
Postfixes: -sm/-md/-lg.		overlays over its relative parent, when visible.
.drawer-window
Postfixes: -sm/-md/-lg.		overlays over browser window, when visible.
.drawer-top
Postfixes: -sm/-md/-lg.		Shows at top of its relative parent or window.
.drawer-right
Postfixes: -sm/-md/-lg.		Shows at right of its relative parent or window.
.drawer-bottom
Postfixes: -sm/-md/-lg.		Shows at bottom of its relative parent or window.
.drawer-left
Postfixes: -sm/-md/-lg.		Shows at left of its relative parent or window.
components.rawdescription:

CSS Class NameDescription

.drawer-window
Postfixes: -sm/-md/-lg.		overlays over browser window, when visible.
.drawer-top
Postfixes: -sm/-md/-lg.		Shows at top of its relative parent or window.
.drawer-right
Postfixes: -sm/-md/-lg.		Shows at right of its relative parent or window.
.drawer-bottom
Postfixes: -sm/-md/-lg.		Shows at bottom of its relative parent or window.
.drawer-left
Postfixes: -sm/-md/-lg.		Shows at left of its relative parent or window.

components.name: MultiSelectBoxComponent
components.templateData:
<ng-container *ngFor="let item of items">
    <label class="multi-select-item row nowrap spacing spacing-around center" [ngClass]="{'selected shadow': isItemSelected(item)}">
        {{item[labelField]}}
        <input class="no-border" [name]="item[keyField]" type="checkbox" [checked]="isItemSelected(item)" (change)="onChanged($event, item)"></label>
</ng-container>

variables.name: CardComponent
CodeBlockComponent
variables.defaultValue:
{
    projectionContent: '',
    inputPropsValues: {
        source: `<!DOCTYPE html>
        <html lang="en">
        <head>
            <meta charset="UTF-8">
            <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
            <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
            <title>Document</title>
        </head>
        <body>

        </body>
